institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: National Human Resources Development Consortium Operating Rules/Article 27 (Duties of Person in Charge)
contents: Article 27 (Work of the person in charge) ① The person in charge must perform the following tasks related to the consortium project. 1. Tasks such as establishment of education and training and evaluation plans, development of teaching materials and teaching materials, etc. 2. Tasks such as trainee management and consultation, selection and management of teachers and instructors, and implementation of education and training, etc. 3. Discovery of contract companies, maintenance and management of contract companies, etc. 4. Tasks such as conducting demand surveys and analyzing results, surveying the satisfaction of contracting company personnel and trainees, and trainee follow-up management, 5. Tasks such as producing and distributing promotional materials, website management, etc. 6. Writing annual business plans, managing business budget , Tasks such as operation and management of the steering committee, business performance and performance management, etc. 7. Tasks such as operation and on-site inspection of partner training institutions, budget management, performance and performance management, etc. ② In addition to the tasks under paragraph 1, the person in charge of the contracting company To support education and training, the following tasks may be performed. 1. Consulting on the use of NCS by contracting companies and work related to the expansion of the work-study parallel system, 2. Other work deemed necessary for the operation of the consortium business, ③ The person in charge of receiving labor cost support under Article 20 shall be subject to paragraphs 1 and 2. You cannot perform any other duties other than the relevant duties.
